name: Flappy Beans Free
description:
Flappy Beans Free is a 2d physics based puzzle game. You need to draw lines to help beans fly into the Targets.

Flappy Beans Free is a wonderful and funny time killer free puzzle game! It's easy and fun to play and you can take on this puzzling Saga alone or without Wi-Fi.

Flappy Beans Free is completely free to play but some in-game items such as brushs will require payment. You can turn off payment features by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Flappy Beans Features:
• Puzzle game with excellent physics experience.
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master!
• 60 amazing levels now, and more added soon!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

Follow us to get news and updates:

https://twitter.com/HeroRescueSaga
https://www.facebook.com/Mahjong-Knight-Studio-1571318006507612/

Have fun and Enjoy Flappy Beans Free.

Flappy Beans Free is completely free to play and you can play with no wifi and you can unlock full game features when connected to the Internet.

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Flappy Beans Free!
